_Version of containscord: Don't change this until your sure
_Bot config: Put your token and the name.
name: Super-Bot
_Prefix config: You can put signs like ! or ; or $ etc... put mention if you want a @<name of the bot> as a prefix
_Owner config: Put your name here (OPTIONAL but require to use 'owner' permission level in command)
_Other config: Put true or false to activate / deactivate an option.
